name: SYMLO
description:
In this game you fight with Satan.

The game is designed for 18+ years.

Too frightening sounds, Story; You are running away from the mental hospital

the way you have hallucinations, and you need to get out of where their tongues.

For every you kill a man you fall into hell.

You can go back from there as you press the R key to restart.

Control WSDA - (R) mouse left and right. Space.
